description: The spell drains you of your vitality, reducing your hp to 1.
description_roll_text: The spell drains me of all of my health.

description: Your health is completely restored.
description_roll_text: My health is fully restored.

description: You regain all expended sorcery points.
description_roll_text: I regain all my sorcery points.

description: You regain all expended spell slots.
description_roll_text: I regain all my spell slots.

description: You minimize the damage caused by the spell.
description_roll_text: I minimize the damage caused by the spell.

description: You maximize the damage caused by the spell.
description_roll_text: I maximize the damage caused by the spell.

description: You cast Fireball instead.
description_roll_text: I cast Fireball instead.

description: You cast Ice Storm instead.
description_roll_text: I cast Ice Storm instead.

description: You cast Magic Missile instead.
description_roll_text: I cast Magic Missile instead.

description: You cast Scorching Ray instead.
description_roll_text: I cast Scorching Ray instead.

description: You cast chain lightning instead.
description_roll_text: I cast Chain Lightning instead.

description: You cast Polymorph instead, transforming the target into a sheep if the spell works.
description_roll_text: I cast Polymorph instead, transforming the target into a sheep if the spell works.

description: You cast Finger of Death instead.
description_roll_text: I cast Finger of Death instead.

description: You cast Thunderwave instead.
description_roll_text: I cast Thunderwave instead.

description: You cast Confusion instead.
description_roll_text: I cast Confusion instead.

description: You cast regeneration instead.
description_roll_text: I cast Regeneration instead.

description: You cast heal on yourself instead.
description_roll_text: I cast heal on myself instead.

description: You cast cure wounds on yourself instead.
description_roll_text: I cast Cure Wounds on myself instead.

description: You switched positions with the target.
description_roll_text: I switched positions with the target.

description: You can see any invisible creatures.
description_roll_text: I can see any invisible creatures.

description: You can now Speak with Animals.
description_roll_text: I can now Speak with Animals.

description: A celestial appears next to you. It’s not controlled by you.
description_roll_text: A celestial appears next to me. It's not controlled by me.

description: A demon appears next to you. It’s controlled by you.
description_roll_text: A demon appears next to me. It's controlled by me.

description: Your height is reduced by 6 inches.
description_roll_text: My height is reduced by 6 inches.

description: Your height is increased by 6 inches.
description_roll_text: My height is increased by 6 inches.

description: Your eyes shines with a bright light.
description_roll_text: My eyes shine with a bright light.

description: Plants grow all around you.
description_roll_text: Plants grow all around me.

description: Your clothes become uncomfortably tight .
description_roll_text: My clothes become uncomfortably tight.

description: You grow a long beard made of feathers that remains until you sneeze, at which point the feathers explode out from your face.
description_roll_text: I grow a long beard made of feathers that remains until I sneeze, at which point the feathers explode out from my face.

description: A daisy sprouts from your head.
description_roll_text: A daisy sprouts from my head.

description: Slippery grease appears all over the floor.
description_roll_text: Slippery grease appears all over the floor.

description: Faerie Fire appears around the target.
description_roll_text: Faerie Fire appears around the target.

description: You have a brief vision of the future.
description_roll_text: I have a brief vision of the future.

description: Your skin turns a vibrant shade of pink.
description_roll_text: My skin turns a vibrant shade of pink.

description: You become unable to turn left.
description_roll_text: I become unable to turn left.

description: An eye appears on your forehead for the next hour.
description_roll_text: An eye appears on my forehead for the next hour.

description: You grow horns, which lasts for 1 hour.
description_roll_text: I grow horns, which lasts for 1 hour.

description: Your speed is doubled for the next hour.
description_roll_text: My speed is doubled for the next hour.

description: All light sources within a 60’ radius are extinguished.
description_roll_text: All light sources within a 60’ radius are extinguished.

description: You teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.
description_roll_text: I teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space that I can see.

description: One of target’s eyes replaced by 500 GP sapphire.
description_roll_text: One of the target’s eye is replaced by a 500 GP sapphire.

description: You are transported to the Astral Plane.
description_roll_text: I am transported to the Astral Plane.

description: A pony appears next to you.
description_roll_text: A pony appears next to me.

description: You become 5 years older.
description_roll_text: I become 5 years older.

description: You become 5 years younger.
description_roll_text: I become 5 years younger.

description: You take no action on your next turn. Instead, you vomit 100 gold pieces.
description_roll_text: I take no action on my next turn. Instead I vomit 100 gold pieces.

description: 3 flumphs appear next to you and are frightened of you.
description_roll_text: 3 flumphs appear next to me and are frightened of me.

description: A dragon appears next to you. It’s not controlled by you.
description_roll_text: A dragon appears next to me. It's not controlled by me.

description: Everyone around you is stunned in place, unable to react to your next action.
description_roll_text: Everyone around me is stunned in place, unable to react to my next action.

description: You turn into a potted plant until the start of your next turn.
description_roll_text: I turn into a potted plant until the start of my next turn.

description: You turn into a harmless, affectionate critter until the start of your next turn.
description_roll_text: I turn into a harmless, affectionate critter until the start of my next turn.

description: Spider legs sprout from your back, allowing you to climb walls. The legs remain in place for one hour.
description_roll_text: Spider legs sprout from my back, allowing me to climb walls. The legs remain in place for one hour.

description: You start to levitate.
description_roll_text: I start to levitate.

description: You also cast Freedom of Movement on yourself.
description_roll_text: I also cast Freedom of Movement on myself.

description: A unicorn appears next to you.
description_roll_text: A unicorn appears next to me.

description: A confused bear appears next to you.
description_roll_text: A confused bear appears next to me.

description: You can't speak for the next minute. Whenever you try, pink bubbles float out of your mouth.
description_roll_text: I can't speak for the next minute. Whenever I try, pink bubbles float out of my mouth.

description: You're deafened for the next minute. For this duration, green smoke pours out from your ears.
description_roll_text: I'm deafened for the next minute. For this duration, green smoke pours out from my ears.

description: Your arms transforms into tentacles for the next minute.
description_roll_text: My arms transform into tentacles for the next minute.

description: A Wall of Fire encircles you.
description_roll_text: A Wall of Fire encircles me.

description: You are immune to being intoxicated by alcohol for the next week.
description_roll_text: I am immune to being intoxicated by alcohol for the next week.

description: A buffet full of all of your favorite food and drinks appears in front of you.
description_roll_text: A buffet full of all of my favorite food and drinks appears in front of me.

description: All doors/windows within 60 feet fly open.
description_roll_text: All doors/windows within 60 feet fly open.

description: You shoot eight poisonous snakes from your fingertips.
description_roll_text: I shoot eight poisonous snakes from my fingertips.

description: For the next minute, any flammable object you touch that isn't being worn or carried by another creature bursts into flame.
description_roll_text: For the next minute, any flammable object I touch that isn't being worn or carried by another creature bursts into flame.

description: For the next minute, any organic material you touch decays. Food spoils, plants wilt, etc.
description_roll_text: For the next minute, any organic material I touch decays. Food spoils, plants wilt, etc.

description: Anything you touch turns to gold for the next minute.
description_roll_text: Anything I touch turns to gold for the next minute.

description: For the next minute, you must shout when you speak.
description_roll_text: For the next minute, I must shout when I speak.

description: An illusory image of you is left permanently where you are right now.
description_roll_text: An illusory image of me is left permanently where I am right now.

description: A dense fog appears all around you.
description_roll_text: A dense fog appears all around me.

description: A deep darkness appears all around you.
description_roll_text: A deep darkness appears all around me.

description: If the target dies due to the spell’s effect, its ghost haunts you.
description_roll_text: If the target dies due to the spell’s effect, its ghost haunts me.

description: All nearby creatures are frightened by you.
description_roll_text: All nearby creatures are frightened by me.

description: You are trapped in a very breakable crystal.
description_roll_text: I am trapped in a very breakable crystal.

description: Each creature within 30 feet of you becomes invisible for the next minute. This doesn’t include you.
description_roll_text: Each creature within 30 feet of me becomes invisible for the next minute. This doesn’t include you.

description: For the next minute, creatures within 30 feet of you can't see further than 30 feet away.
description_roll_text: For the next minute, creatures within 30 feet of me can't see further than 30 feet away.

description: All creatures within 60 feet of you becomes poisoned.
description_roll_text: All creatures within 60 feet of me become poisoned.

description: All creatures within 60 ft. of you falls asleep until they take damage. While asleep they are unconscious.
description_roll_text: All creatures within 60 ft. of me fall asleep until they take damage. While asleep, they are unconscious.

description: You glow with bright light in a 30-foot radius for the next minute.
description_roll_text: I glow with bright light in a 30-foot radius for the next minute.

description: You are polymorphed into a sheep.
description_roll_text: I am polymorphed into a sheep.

description: Your body starts turning into stone.
description_roll_text: My body starts turning into stone.

description: Illusory butterflies and flower petals flutter in the air within 10 feet of you for the next minute.
description_roll_text: Illusory butterflies and flower petals flutter in the air within 10 feet of me for the next minute.

description: Illusory rain and autumn leaves fall to the floor and then vanish within 10 feet of you for the next minute.
description_roll_text: Illusory rain and autumn leaves fall to the floor and then vanish within 10 feet of me for the next minute.

description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear near you.
description_roll_text: Three illusory duplicates of myself appear in near me.

description: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you.
description_roll_text: My body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see me.

description: All creatures within 60 feet of you starts flying, including yourself.
description_roll_text: All creatures within 60 feet of me starts flying, including myself.

description: Gravity is reversed around you.
description_roll_text: Gravity is reversed around me.

description: You become invisible for the next minute. During that time, other creatures can't hear you.
description_roll_text: I become invisible for the next minute. During that time, other creatures can't hear me.

description: You start to blink in and out of existence
description_roll_text: I start to blink in and out of existence

description: You become large for the next minute.
description_roll_text: I become large for the next minute.

description: You become small for the next minute.
description_roll_text: I become small for the next minute.

description: You and all creatures within 30 feet of becomes blind for the next minute.
description_roll_text: I and all creatures within 30 feet of me become blind for the next minute.

description: All weapons within 30 ft. of you turns into food for the next minute.
description_roll_text: All weapons within 30 ft. of me turn into food for the next minute.

description: You are surrounded by faint, ethereal music for the next minute.
description_roll_text: I am surrounded by faint, ethereal music for the next minute.

description: Gentle gusts of wind blows outward from you for the next minute. All creatures within 40 feet can feel it, but otherwise does nothing.
description_roll_text: Gentle gusts of wind blow outward from me for the next minute. All creatures within 40 feet can feel it, but otherwise, it does nothing.

description: For 1 minute, an illusory duplicate of yourself under your control appears on an open space nearest to you.
description_roll_text: For 1 minute, an illusory duplicate of myself under my control appears on an open space nearest to me.

description: You gain a 3 feet long prehensile tail for 1 hour.
description_roll_text: I gain a 3 feet long prehensile tail for 1 hour.

description: A loud voice ridicules you for the next hour.
description_roll_text: A loud voice ridicules me for the next hour.

description: The next sentence you utter becomes true.
description_roll_text: The next sentence I utter becomes true.

description: Massive explosions surround you, consuming all your available spell slots in the process.
description_roll_text: Massive explosions surround me, consuming all my available spell slots in the process.
